name: MEDIIA
tagline: Ministerio Evangelístico de Desarrollo Informático Independiente Adventista
body:
## Bienvenido!
Somos un grupo de diseñadores, programadores, teólogos y entusiastas que desean servir al Señor a través de la tecnología.
En breve colocaremos más información…

### Nuestros proyectos activos
* Creencias Adventistas ![Android](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/encharm/Font-Awesome-SVG-PNG/master/black/png/16/android.png)
* Flattr para Institutos Misioneros ![Android](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/encharm/Font-Awesome-SVG-PNG/master/black/png/16/android.png)
* Carpeta on-line para conquistadores ![web](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/encharm/Font-Awesome-SVG-PNG/master/black/png/16/globe.png)

### Proyectos aún no comenzados
* Duolingo Bíblico ![Android](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/encharm/Font-Awesome-SVG-PNG/master/black/png/16/android.png) ![iOS](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/encharm/Font-Awesome-SVG-PNG/master/black/png/16/apple.png)
* Curso básico interactivo de Exégesis ![web](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/encharm/Font-Awesome-SVG-PNG/master/black/png/16/globe.png)
* Curso de homilética ![Android](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/encharm/Font-Awesome-SVG-PNG/master/black/png/16/android.png) ![web](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/encharm/Font-Awesome-SVG-PNG/master/black/png/16/globe.png)
* Línea de tiempo interactiva de la historia adventista ![web](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/encharm/Font-Awesome-SVG-PNG/master/black/png/16/globe.png)
* Coritario ![Android](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/encharm/Font-Awesome-SVG-PNG/master/black/png/16/android.png) ![iOS](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/encharm/Font-Awesome-SVG-PNG/master/black/png/16/apple.png)
* Wikilena ![web](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/encharm/Font-Awesome-SVG-PNG/master/black/png/16/globe.png)
* Preguntas frecuentes sobre el Espíritu de Profecía ![Android](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/encharm/Font-Awesome-SVG-PNG/master/black/png/16/android.png) ![iOS](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/encharm/Font-Awesome-SVG-PNG/master/black/png/16/apple.png) ![web](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/encharm/Font-Awesome-SVG-PNG/master/black/png/16/globe.png)
* Marcador Bíblico y del Espíritu de Profecía ![Android](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/encharm/Font-Awesome-SVG-PNG/master/black/png/16/android.png) ![iOS](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/encharm/Font-Awesome-SVG-PNG/master/black/png/16/apple.png)
* Club del libro digital ![Android](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/encharm/Font-Awesome-SVG-PNG/master/black/png/16/android.png) ![iOS](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/encharm/Font-Awesome-SVG-PNG/master/black/png/16/apple.png)
* Estudios Bíblicos on-line ![Android](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/encharm/Font-Awesome-SVG-PNG/master/black/png/16/android.png) ![iOS](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/encharm/Font-Awesome-SVG-PNG/master/black/png/16/apple.png) ![web](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/encharm/Font-Awesome-SVG-PNG/master/black/png/16/globe.png)
* Localizador de Iglesias para móviles ![Android](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/encharm/Font-Awesome-SVG-PNG/master/black/png/16/android.png) ![iOS](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/encharm/Font-Awesome-SVG-PNG/master/black/png/16/apple.png)
* AI Evangelizer ![Android](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/encharm/Font-Awesome-SVG-PNG/master/black/png/16/android.png) ![iOS](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/encharm/Font-Awesome-SVG-PNG/master/black/png/16/apple.png) ![web](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/encharm/Font-Awesome-SVG-PNG/master/black/png/16/globe.png)
* Kickstarter Adventista ![Android](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/encharm/Font-Awesome-SVG-PNG/master/black/png/16/android.png) ![iOS](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/encharm/Font-Awesome-SVG-PNG/master/black/png/16/apple.png) ![web](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/encharm/Font-Awesome-SVG-PNG/master/black/png/16/globe.png)
* Bolsa de trabajo adventista ![Android](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/encharm/Font-Awesome-SVG-PNG/master/black/png/16/android.png) ![iOS](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/encharm/Font-Awesome-SVG-PNG/master/black/png/16/apple.png) ![web](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/encharm/Font-Awesome-SVG-PNG/master/black/png/16/globe.png)
* Bibleworks online ![Android](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/encharm/Font-Awesome-SVG-PNG/master/black/png/16/android.png) ![iOS](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/encharm/Font-Awesome-SVG-PNG/master/black/png/16/apple.png) ![web](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/encharm/Font-Awesome-SVG-PNG/master/black/png/16/globe.png)

### Proyectos no comenzados por negociaciones pendientes de copyright
* El Arte de dar estudios bíblicos
* Como hacer llamados para Cristo
* Fotolibro de diagramas proféticos
* Himnario Adventista
* Comentario Bíblico on-line
